    • Field Detail

      • BEAN_BIND_ATTEMPT_INTERVAL

        public static final LongSetting BEAN_BIND_ATTEMPT_INTERVAL
        Defines how long to wait between consecutive bind attempts when a service bean is in UNBOUND state.

      • SERVICE_LEASE_RENEW_INTERVAL

        public static final LongSetting SERVICE_LEASE_RENEW_INTERVAL
        Defines how long to wait between consecutive lease renewals for a service bean that is in BOUND sate.

      • ENFORCE_SUBSYSTEM_BOUNDARIES

        public static final BooleanSetting ENFORCE_SUBSYSTEM_BOUNDARIES

      • SERVICE_REGISTRY_URI_PROPERTY_NAME

        public static final String SERVICE_REGISTRY_URI_PROPERTY_NAME
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVICE_REGISTRY_URI

        public static final StringSetting SERVICE_REGISTRY_URI
        Service Uri used to bind to the service-registry.

      • RUN_SERVICE_REGISTRY_EXPORTER

        public static final BooleanSetting RUN_SERVICE_REGISTRY_EXPORTER

      • ASTRIX_SERVICE_REGISTRY_URI

        @Deprecated
public static final StringSetting ASTRIX_SERVICE_REGISTRY_URI
        Deprecated. Renamed to SERVICE_REGISTRY_URI

      • SERVICE_REGISTRY_EXPORT_INTERVAL

        public static final LongSetting SERVICE_REGISTRY_EXPORT_INTERVAL
        All services provided will be registered in the service-registry on a regular interval. This Setting defines the interval (in millis) on which provided services will be registered in the service-registry Defaults to 30 seconds (30 000 ms)

      • SERVICE_REGISTRY_EXPORT_RETRY_INTERVAL

        public static final LongSetting SERVICE_REGISTRY_EXPORT_RETRY_INTERVAL
        When registration in the service registry fails, there is an option to wait a shorter time then the regular time defined by SERVICE_REGISTRY_EXPORT_INTERVAL Defaults to 5 seconds (5 000 ms)

      • SERVICE_REGISTRY_LEASE

        public static final LongSetting SERVICE_REGISTRY_LEASE

      • API_PROVIDER_SCANNER_BASE_PACKAGE

        public static final StringSetting API_PROVIDER_SCANNER_BASE_PACKAGE
        Defines the basePackage(s) to scan when searching for ApiProvider's. The given package(s) and all subpackages will be scanned. The packages should be separated by comma (",").

      • SUBSYSTEM_NAME

        public static final StringSetting SUBSYSTEM_NAME

      • ENABLE_FAULT_TOLERANCE

        public static final BooleanSetting ENABLE_FAULT_TOLERANCE

      • EXPORT_ASTRIX_MBEANS

        public static final BooleanSetting EXPORT_ASTRIX_MBEANS
        Whether Astrix should export MBEANS

      • ENABLE_BEAN_METRICS

        public static final BooleanSetting ENABLE_BEAN_METRICS
        Whether Astrix should collect statistics about each bean invocation.

      • GIGA_SPACE_BEAN_NAME

        public static final StringSetting GIGA_SPACE_BEAN_NAME

      • DYNAMIC_CONFIG_FACTORY

        public static final StringSetting DYNAMIC_CONFIG_FACTORY

      • GS_DISABLE_LOCAL_VIEW

        public static final BooleanSetting GS_DISABLE_LOCAL_VIEW
        When local view is disabled every service that is exported using local-view (AstrixServiceComponentNames.GS_LOCAL_VIEW) will use a regular clustered proxy instead.

      • GS_LOCAL_VIEW_MAX_DISCONNECTION_TIME

        public static final LongSetting GS_LOCAL_VIEW_MAX_DISCONNECTION_TIME
